workaround SWFObject bug that reports stage size of 0 under certain circumstances, especially page refreshes
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
A collection of skinning and styling bug fixes.
SDK-21061 - borderColor style appears when color is set to red (or 0xFF0000) for Halo Button with Spark skin
SDK-20818 - When the SparkDownloadProgressBar shows an error, the bar should be visible.
SDK-20735 - The documentation for the protected property initProgressHandler mentions the label of a Spark DownloadProgressBar even though it has no label.
SDK-20732 - The backgroundImage property does nothing for the SparkDownloadProgressBar
SDK-20101 - Halo ColorPicker with Spark skin doesnt look very good after setting scaleX or scaleY
SDK-20150 - Emphasized FxButton needs wireframe theme skin
SDK-19584 - When an item is disabled in a Menu, the branch icon does not look disabled.
QA: The errorColor has changed slightly (0xFF0000 to 0xFE0000), so new bitmaps need to be generated
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Updates to revision 6205. SystemManager uses the Spark download progress bar if no others are defined. Updated ASDoc comments on SparkDownloadProgressBar. Made SparkDownloadProgressBar.initCompleteHandler() protected so QE can override for testing.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Add Spark download progress bar. This one operates a bit differently than the Halo version. When the file is being downloaded, the track expands. When the app is initializing, the bar expands in the track. It does not contain any text.
The Halo DLPB is still available. If you want to use it, add 'preloader="mx.preloaders.DownloadProgressBar"' to your Application tag.
Doc: The new preloaderBaseColor property added to both Application classes includes a first pass at ASDoc comments.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Remove ADOBE SYSTEMS license and replace with Apache license in headers - frameworks.  A 2nd pass will be needed to get the files not handled up by the scripts.
